Name: Kusari Kingdom
About the game: Kusari Kingdom is an innovative puzzle game which uses a chain reaction mechanic similar to Dominoes falling over. Each level consists of an 8x8 board with enemies on it that need to be eliminated using your Defenders. Defenders each have their unique pattern when triggered, activating both other Defenders and at the same time damaging enemies. With only a certain amount of triggers try to get rid of all enemies. Use your logic skills to defend the Kingdom against the evil forces. If a level seems too hard, you'll get hints automatically. Multiplayer mode and more levels upcoming if there are enough voices calling for it ;) You can try the Playtest version for free. It contains everything the full version contains except it has a reduced number of levels.
